title: The Hanoi Social Club
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe, restaurant, and bar housed in a 100 year old villa with air-condition inside. Sketches and paintings from local artists adorn the walls, and a garden bar is on the top floor. Hosts live music nights. The menu features Pan-European food with some meals being vegetarian and a few vegan.
